mapper.select:
SELECT R.RSVT_NO, R.PAT_NO, P.PAT_NM, P.RRN1, FN_WS_DECRYPT(P.RRN2) AS RRN2, P.AGE, P.GENDER, P.SMS_RECEIVE_NO AS SMS, RSVT_DATE, RSVT_TIME, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(INSP_PLN_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'YYYYMMDD') AS INSP_PLN_DATE, INSP_PLN_TIME, APL_MAN, APL_MAN_TEL, RSHIP, R.PCK_CD AS PCK_CD, PCK.PCK_NM, BASIC_INSP_AMT, R.REDUC_CD, RD.REDUC_NM, R.REDUC_AMT, RSVT_AMT, BASIC_INSP_SUM_AMT, PAY_MAN, E.EMP_NM AS RSVT_RESP, MEMO, NVL(R.CANCEL_YN,'N') AS CANCEL_YN, CHO_INSP_AMT, INSP_SUM_AMT, RD.REDUC_NM, RECE_YN FROM SC_RSVT R, SC_REDUC RD, SC_PCK PCK, WS_PAT P, HM_EMP E , SC_RECEIPT RC
WHERE R.PAT_NO = P.PAT_NO AND R.RSVT_RESP = E.EMP_NO(+) AND R.REDUC_CD = RD.REDUC_CD(+) AND R.PCK_CD = PCK.PCK_CD(+)
AND TO_DATE(INSP_PLN_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') >= TO_DATE(#{inspPlnDate},'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND NVL(R.CANCEL_YN,'N') = 'N' AND RC.RSVT_NO(+) = R.RSVT_NO AND (RC.CANCEL_YN = 'Y' OR APL_DATE IS NULL)
mapper.update: UPDATE SC_RSVT SET CANCEL_YN=#{cancelYn}, MOD_ID=#{userId}, MOD_IP=#{userIp}, MOD_DATE=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') WHERE RSVT_NO = #{rsvtNo}
